name: Catch Digital
tag_list: digital-production-partner, open-source-development, drupal, wordpress, design, seo, ecommerce, content-management, social-media-campaigns
overview:
Catch is a full service digital agency.

RAR accredited for 2011, we also feature in the 50 most successful independent digital agencies in London as published in The Drum.

We specialise in providing the design and technical production of websites, web and mobile applications for a wide variety of organisations.

We also partner with traditional advertising agencies and other digital agencies who require specialist digital skills or an additional resource to deliver a project through both the pitch and delivery phase.

Our team of designers, developers, producers and account managers all contribute to our wide ranging skill set which includes content management, eCommerce, mobile applications, search engine optimisation and social media campaigns.

Having a client roster that includes NMA top 50 agencies, FSA regulated City firms and FMCG brands we offer a no-nonsense transparent approach that underpins everything we do from strategy to design and technology.
